people_also_ask.heading: Many games in the Angry Birds franchise (including Angry Birds Classic and Angry Birds: Seasons) were originally taken off storefronts in 2019 due to the challenges of consistently having to update new versions of the games within the fast paced and continuous development of mobile technology.22-Jun-2021

people_also_ask.heading: In early 2019, all remaining Angry Birds games released before October 2014 (with the exception of Friends) were discontinued and removed from app stores, though Bad Piggies was added back in early 2020.

knowledge_panel.description: angry birds is a 2009 casual puzzle video game developed by rovio entertainment. inspired primarily by a sketch of stylized wingless birds, the game was first released for ios and maemo devices starting in december 2009. wikipedia
